      Create a Bezier object based on points passed as a 2D array.

      Calculate the point for a given parametric point 't' on the curve.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bezier3D

        public Bezier3D(float[][] points,
                int nbrPoints,
                boolean useZ)
        Create a Bezier object based on points passed as a 2D array.
        Parameters:
        points - 2D array[point no.][x/y]
        nbrPoints - number of points to use from array
        useZ - true 3D Bezier : false = 2D Bezier

      • Bezier3D

        public Bezier3D(processing.core.PVector[] points,
                boolean useZ)
        Create a Bezier object based on an array of vectors.
        The bezier curve will use all of the points in the array.
        Parameters:
        points - array of control points

    • Method Detail

        public void force2D()

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        array of PVector holding points
